languages.text: {n}Смущение касается щек Кассии, а затем и ваших.{/n} "Вы очень любезны. Я буду рада порисовать с вами еще. В более... привычной обстановке".

{n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."
languages.original_text: {n}Смущение касается щек Кассии, а затем и ваших.{/n} "Вы очень любезны. Я буду рада порисовать с вами еще. В более... привычной обстановке".

traits.locale_text: {n}Embarrassment tints first Cassia's cheeks, then your own.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint together with you another time. Perhaps in a more... customary context."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous percevez l'embarras de Cassia, qui s'empourpre légèrement.{/n} « Vous êtes trop aimable. Ce serait un plaisir de vous peindre à nouveau, mais peut-être dans un environnement plus... traditionnel, la prochaine fois. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous percevez l'embarras de Cassia, qui s'empourpre légèrement.{/n} « Vous êtes trop aimable. Ce serait un plaisir de vous peindre à nouveau, mais peut-être dans un environnement plus... traditionnel, la prochaine fois. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las mejillas de Cassia se sonrojan y sientes el calor de la vergüenza.{/n} «Es usted muy amable. Sería un placer volver a pintar así en otra ocasión. Aunque quizá prefiera un entorno más... tradicional».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mejillas de Cassia se sonrojan y sientes el calor de la vergüenza.{/n} «Es usted muy amable. Sería un placer volver a pintar así en otra ocasión. Aunque quizá prefiera un entorno más... tradicional».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅的脸颊变得绯红，你感觉一阵局促从心底涌了上来。{/n}“你真是个和蔼可亲的人。我很希望有机会能再为你画一幅这样的画，不过，或许是在更……传统的环境下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅的脸颊变得绯红，你感觉一阵局促从心底涌了上来。{/n}“你真是个和蔼可亲的人。我很希望有机会能再为你画一幅这样的画，不过，或许是在更……传统的环境下。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアの頬っぺたがピンクになり、あなたは恥ずかしくなった。{/n}「あなたはとても優雅です。またいつか、このようなものを描きたいです。ですが、もう少し…普通の場所で」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの頬っぺたがピンクになり、あなたは恥ずかしくなった。{/n}「あなたはとても優雅です。またいつか、このようなものを描きたいです。ですが、もう少し…普通の場所で」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassias Wangen färben sich rosa und du spürst Scham in dir aufsteigen.{/n} "Wirklich sehr gütig. Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen, irgendwann noch einmal auf diese Weise zu malen. Wenn auch vielleicht in einer ... traditionelleren Umgebung."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın yanakları pembeleşiyor ve içinde yoğun bir utanma duygusu hissediyorsun.{/n} "Çok naziksin. Bir gün yine bu şekilde resim yapabilmek, benim için büyük zevk olurdu. Hoş, biraz daha... Geleneksel bir yerde yapmayı tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks turn pink, and you feel a flush of embarrassment.{/n} "You are most gracious. It would be a pleasure to paint like this again sometime. Though perhaps in a more... traditional environment."
